ModMetaData.name: Giddy-up! Mechanoids
ModMetaData.author: Roolo
ModMetaData.description: If it's possible to hack mechanoids, why limit yourself to riding animals if you can ride deadly machines to battle. And why limit yourself to letting humans ride if you can let Mechanoids Ride animals, or other mechanoids! This mod brings Giddy-up! and [url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=44082.0] What the Hack!?[/url] together and needs no further introduction.
